title: Omnifocus 1.5 + Omnifocus for iPhone IPA
description:
Includes instruction on how to crack Omnifocus 1.5 yourself AND install the Omnifocus for iPhone IPA file to your iPhone/iTouch:

It is easy to crack it yourself. I tried it for first time and it works. So how to?

Download free program HexEdit <a href="
http://www.versiontracker.com/dyn/moreinfo/macosx/10658" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.versiontracker.com/dyn/moreinfo/macosx/10658</a>

Click on OmniFocus.app (this 1.5 version) and find this file:
OmniFocus.app > Contents > MacOS > OmniFocus
..open this file with HexEdit

Then use Find function in HexEdit - here use hex mode.
(there is also ascii mode)
..find this:
0f84630b0000
..replace it with this:
0f85630b0000

..then save changes and run OmniFocus 1.5 cracked by yourself. It works for me. The only think - dont run licence manager in menu - the OmniFocus crashes, but you can run it again.

Turn off automatic updates in preferences.

AND ONE THING: IT TAKES LONG TIME FOR NEW OMNIFOCUS TO BACKUP DATABASE AND UPGRADE TO NEW ONE. JUST WAIT.



> Jailbreak your iPhone/iPod using Pwnage Tools: http://forums.macrumors.com/showthread.php?t=462648
> Once Jailbreak is completed successfully, a new application will appear on your iPhone/iPod called "Cydia." Open installer and search for "MobileInstallation" and install this package. This will modify the iPhone's native mobile installation rules, allowing you to install .IPA files directly to your iPhone or iTunes, independent of the iTunes store. 
> Double-click "OmniFocus-v1.1.4.ipa" included in this torrent.
> Omnifocus will be loaded into your iTunes Applications tab. Sync with your iPhone/iPod and you now have a fully functioning Omnifocus mac + iPhone combo.
> Visit http://appulo.us and browse/search from 1000s of iPhone apps. Click it and download it from one of the several download links provided. When downloaded, double-click the .IPA file.
